description:
Having gained immense power, Yuuri smiles eerily and targets Yuuya...! Yuuchou stands in his way. With the feelings of his son held close in his heart, the curtain rises on a fierce battle with Yuuri...!! Will Yuushou`s entertainment Duel be able to stop Yuuri`s rampage...?!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Greatest Entertainer of the Age
稀代のエンターテイナー
